snippet: The authorities were working to determine if human remains that washed ashore are those of Avonte Oquendo, 14, who disappeared more than three months ago.
abstract: New York City medical examiner's office is working to determine if human remains that washed ashore in Queens are those of Avonte Oquendo, 14-year-old autistic boy who disappeared more than three months ago.

byline.contributor: Nate Schweber and Julie Turkewitz contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: The authorities were working to determine if human remains that washed ashore are those of Avonte Oquendo, 14, who disappeared more than three months ago.

headline.main: Remains Examined for Link to Missing Boy With Autism
headline.print_headline: Remains Are Examined for Link to a Missing Boy
